name: DealFinder|Getyourdailydealsandsavemoney
0:
”Alexa, open Deal Finder”
”Alexa, launch Deal Finder”
”Alexa, run Deal Finder”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: deal finder
des:
Deal Finder is the perfect skill for you to find great deals. It helps you to enjoy your shopping at discounted price.
Everyday at 11am EDT, we update the deal list to help you get the best discounts. So, don't hesitate to launch the skill as much as you can.

When you are interested by a deal, you can ask the skill to send you an email containing the rebates. The email contains all today's offers with direct links. Then, you just need to enjoy your purchase, it's that simple ;)

Note: if your device has a screen, you can even see the deal visually.


How to launch "Deal Finder | Get your daily deals and save money"?

You can say:
- "Alexa, open Deal Finder"
- "Alexa, launch Deal Finder"
- "Alexa, run Deal Finder"


How to use "Deal Finder | Get your daily deals and save money"?

To navigate through the deals:
- Say 'next' to check the next deal
- Say 'previous' to review the previous deal
- Say 'send' to get all today's best deals by email
- Say 'repeat' if you want me to repeat the deal
- Say 'restart' if you want to review today's best deals from the beginning
- Say 'stop' to leave the skill


How to support us?

Your review is extremely important and it shows us your support. Please consider leaving a review if you love the skill. Your review encourages us to continue making more skills.
